Control Name: REL 1.3 Accommodate ﬁxed service quotas and constraints through architecture
Control Statement: Be aware of unchangeable service quotas and physical resources, and architect to prevent these from impacting reliability.

control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you manage service quotas and constraints?
